name: language-generic-config
author: Lee Dohm <lee@lee-dohm.com>
description: Provides basic syntax highlighting for configuration files that are just composed of comments or non-comments

enableAutomatch.description: Assign grammar to files which contain comment-like sequences, but don't match any specific language.

automatchPattern.description: Regular expression which determines what lines of a generic-config file are comments.

requireMinimumMatchingLines.description: Limit automatching to files containing at least *`n`* lines that match `automatchPattern`.
